name: Puzzle: The Puzzle
description:
This is the first game I have ever made! I made it in one week as a challenge. 

Check out the YouTube video on it!

INSTALLATION

PC

  • Download .zip file
  • Place in a folder on your computer
  • Right click -> Extract Here
  • Double click on the exe

MAC

If the game doesn't work after unzipping, try to use another unzipping program such as The Unarchiver to open the zip file first.
